meanings.sent1: The screechy violin hurt my ears.
meanings.sent2: Her screechy voice made it hard to concentrate.
meanings.sent3: The screechy cat tried to sing along with the radio.
meanings.sent4: The screechy brakes on the old car echoed through the street.
meanings.sent5: The screechy alarm clock woke me up abruptly.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a shrill, piercing noise
meanings.sent1: The screechy door hinge needed some oil.
meanings.sent2: The screechy tires screeched to a halt.
meanings.sent3: The screechy bird woke up the whole neighborhood with its singing.
meanings.sent4: The screechy microphone feedback startled the audience.
meanings.sent5: The screechy sound of the chalk on the blackboard made everyone cringe.
